products.title: Legacy Zinc
products.description: Legacy zinc made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Legacy Zinc Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A true mid grey shade, this blind is great way to add depth and interest to your window dressing. Product id: sdb-vtb1420 fabric colour: zinc grey material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes legacy zinc grey 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Legacy Stone 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. This light brown vertical blind will look great in rooms with a warm colour scheme to create a cosy feel. Product id: sdb-vtb0962 fabric colour: stone material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes legacy stone 89mm vertical blind in brown.

products.title: Legacy Zinc Vertical Blind
products.description: Using matt and sheen threads to create a soft leaf-like shaped pattern. Available in other colours. Legacy zinc vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Legacy Stone Vertical Blind
products.description: Using matt and sheen threads to create a soft leaf-like shaped pattern. Available in other colours. Legacy stone vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Legacy Stone
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
